text:
Heyo! Am trying to add salesforce campaign to my form and am having no luck with the new form editor :disappointed:
added the q to the forums if anyone would like to help out
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Adding-salesforce-campaign-to-a-form/m-p/347535#M17092>

Hi all!
Not sure if anyone can point me in the right direction, but have a question regarding *promotion pop-ups.*

*Q.* Is it possible to add a pop-up module to a page and make it “smart” in a way that it only appears if a user has viewed the site and not submitted a form? Or any variation of that example.

Any suggestions welcome!
